about_the_game:
Oops! We’ve done it again! Another pack of five fan favorite hats directly from the original Among Us are ready and eager to sit comfortably on your unique little bean heads.

Keep it eclectic with these accidentally-paired-together, fab five favorite fashions. Edible, wild, magical, stylish, random? We’ve got you covered!

The Hat Pack: Accidental Favorites pack includes:
  • Note 2 Self (because who can keep track)
    • Highly requested, highly coveted, not so highly efficient placement
  • MoRawk (go hard, beans)
    • Go hard. Rock on. Fight. Fall. Rise again.
  • Third Eye (but can you see it all?)
    • Does not grant extra vision options to better track fellow Crewmates
  • Magical ’Corn (oh, you fancy)
    • A pretty barn good option to embrace your uniqueness and magicalness!
  • Peeled (apparently potassium is important)
    • Commonly found in trash cans, random sidewalks, racetracks, and on bean’s heads
These fan favorites may be accidentally planned, but they’re tried and true so you be you, Crewmates. You be you.
